00035 ostream* os_ = 0;
00036 
00037 
00038 void testInstantiationWithNull()
00039 {
00040     try 
00041     {
00042         IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator::Config config;
00043         IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator estimator(config);
00044     }
00045     catch (...)
00046     {
00047         if (os_) *os_ << "Null IsotopeCalculator* check ok.\n";
00048         return;
00049     }
00050 
00051     throw runtime_error("Failed to check for null IsotopeCalculator*.");
00052 }
00053 
00054 
00055 void test()
00056 {
00057     const double abundanceCutoff = .01;
00058     const double massPrecision = .1; 
00059     IsotopeCalculator isotopeCalculator(abundanceCutoff, massPrecision);
00060 
00061     IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator::Config config;
00062     config.isotopeCalculator = &isotopeCalculator;
00063 
00064     IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator estimator(config);
00065  
00066     if (os_)
00067         for (int mass=100; mass<=3000; mass+=100)
00068             *os_ << mass << ":\n" << estimator.isotopeEnvelope(mass) << endl;
00069 
00070     // TODO: external verification of these estimates
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00074 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00075 {
00076     try
00077     {
00078         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00079         if (os_) *os_ << "IsotopeEnvelopeEstimatorTest\n";
00080         testInstantiationWithNull();
00081         test();
00082         return 0;
00083     }
00084     catch (exception& e)
00085     {
00086         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00087         return 1;
00088     }
00089 }
